## terraplate parse

Parse the terraplate files and print a summary

### Synopsis

Parse the terraplate files and print a summary.
	
This is useful if you want to check the configuration before running
the build command, for example.

```
terraplate parse [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for parse
```
